data.prayer: Jesus, your return is closer than when we first believed. Please, set urgency in the hearts of the people living in the country of Monaco.
data.verse: Besides this you know the time, that the hour has come for you to wake from sleep. For salvation is nearer to us now than when we first believed.

data.location_label: Photo from the country of Monaco
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Lord, raise up apostolic workers to plant churches in every town in the country of Monaco.
data.verse: The reason I left you in Crete was that you might put in order what was left unfinished and appoint elders in every town, as I directed you.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 78 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Jesus, teach the local leaders in Monaco to be humble and to serve others.
data.verse: It shall not be so among you. But whoever would be great among you must be your servant, and whoever would be first among you must be your slave, even as the Son of Man came not to be served but to serve, and to give his life as a ransom for many.

data.prayer: Spirit, supernaturally prepare encounters with the gospel on sites like Facebook and Instagram for the 37,400 people living in Monaco.
Spirit, cause the 475 believers in Monaco to obey with immediate, radical, costly obedience, like Abraham.
data.verse: Then God said, “Take your son, your only son, whom you love — Isaac — and go to the region of Moriah. Sacrifice him there as a burnt offering on a mountain I will show you.” Early the next morning Abraham got up and loaded his donkey. He took with him two of his servants and his son Isaac. When he had cut enough wood for the burnt offering, he set out for the place God had told him about.

data.prayer: Father, let those from the 475 believers who are shaken and weak remember that your love will never fail them.
data.verse: Love never fails. But where there are prophecies, they will be done away with. Where there are various languages, they will cease. Where there is knowledge, it will be done away with.

data.prayer: Father, you desire the people in the country of Monaco who are far from you to hear about you.
data.verse: "Those who were not told about him will see, and those who have not heard will understand."

data.section_summary:
the country of Monaco has a population of 37,400.

We estimate Monaco has 475 people who might know Jesus, 30,395 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 6,530 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 78 neighbors who need Jesus.
